feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing deployment fixes and service worker hardening with referenced files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the PWA manifest, icons, and the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, and icon assets.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with bilingual messaging and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first fetching, offline fallback, and individual asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling routing, online/offline state, and authenticated vs guest views.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, language toggle, auth buttons, and responsive drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown-based language selector for switching between English and Nepali.
frontend/src/components/OfflineState.tsx: React component displaying an offline alert using localized text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks the browser’s online/offline status using event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n provider with language state, translation lookup, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines English and Nepali translation dictionaries and related type definitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines light/dark CSS variables, global styles, and device-safe-area adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelp.tsx: Displays installation instructions for Android and iOS with localized text and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Shows the welcome screen with features overview and a login prompt using Internet Identity.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color/theme settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, architectural constraints, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features for the Bhetghat PWA dating app.
